item.title: Bulletin updated at 03:41 HKT 11/05/2022
item.description:
At 3 a.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 26 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 94 per cent

The band of thundery showers associated with a trough of low pressure has affected the vicinity of the Pearl River Estuary for the last couple of hours. It will continue to affect Hong Kong in the next few hours. Members of the public should take note of the latest weather information and forecast issued by the Hong Kong Observatory.

Please be reminded that:
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 6:00 a.m. today. A few thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
